issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] DataFrame.collect should return RecordBatchReader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9763](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9763). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
DataFrame.collect should return RecordBatchReader instead of Vec<RecordBatch> in preparation for async support.
